Total intravenous anaesthesia (TIVA)

Total intravenous anaesthesia (TIVA)

Propofol infusion rate 4-12mg/kg/hr; target Cp = 4-6 μg/ml for surgical anaesthesia.

Bolus technique - induction with 2.5mg/kg then boluses of 1mg/kg at 6minute intervals - results in Cp 2.5-7.5 μg/ml.

Remifentanil

Surgical anaesthesia: > 2 n g/ml

Intubation: 4-6 ng/ml.

Or infusion 0.05 - 0.2 μg/kg/min.
